content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student so I have a limited budget. I was wondering if you could lower the price to 300 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 Euros is far below my asking price. I'm looking to rent out my apartment for a fair market value. Would you be willing to pay more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: What would be your lowest possible price? I am really interested in renting your apartment but I cannot afford to pay more than 350 Euros.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 350 Euros is still below my expectations. I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the quality and location of this apartment. Are you able to negotiate further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, of course. Considering the apartment is unfurnished and I have to buy furniture, I think 350 Euros is a reasonable price. I am willing to pay 375 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 375 Euros is still not enough for me to accept. This apartment is brand new and in a prime location. I'm looking for a rent that reflects its value. How about 425 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I can pay 400 Euros per month. I hope this is acceptable to you.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 400 Euros is still not enough for me to consider renting the apartment to you. This is a very competitive market, and I believe the apartment deserves a higher rent. How about 450 Euros? If you can't agree to this price, I'm afraid we'll have to look for other options.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I cannot afford to pay more than 400 Euros per month. I hope you understand my situation as a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position, but I must also look out for my own financial interests. Since we cannot agree on a price, I will have to terminate this negotiation. Good luck with your search for an apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your honesty and understanding. I wish you the best of luck in finding a suitable tenant for your apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your understanding, Yi-Nuo. I hope you find an apartment that meets your needs and budget. Goodbye. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
